net.spy.memcached.transcoders.Transcoder<java.lang.Object>
Direct Known Subclasses:
JavaSessionSerializationTranscoder
public abstract class SessionTranscoder
extends net.spy.memcached.transcoders.SerializingTranscoder

A subclass of SerializingTranscoder that is used to deserialize sessions that are still stored in memcached with the old serialization format (the whole session was serialized by the serialization strategy, not only attributes).
